thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Wednesday, 16 May 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Alberta Premier Notley says confident will eventually get to right place on Kinder Morgan Canada pipeline

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Alberta Premier Notley says confident will eventually get to right place on Kinder Morgan Canada pipeline
text:
May 16 (Reuters) - Kinder Morgan Inc:
* ALBERTA PREMIER NOTLEY SAYS FEDERAL GOVERNMENT’S STATEMENT ON POSSIBLY PROVIDING AID TO KINDER MORGAN CANADA IS ‘IMPORTANT’
* ALBERTA PREMIER NOTLEY SAYS WORKING CLOSELY WITH OTTAWA TO PROVIDE LEGAL CERTAINTY TO INVESTORS, CONFIDENT SOLUTIONS CAN BE FOUND
* ALBERTA PREMIER NOTLEY SAYS SHE IS IN DAY-TO-DAY CONTACT WITH FEDERAL FINANCE MINISTER MORNEAU
* ALBERTA PREMIER NOTLEY SAYS WILL DO EVERYTHING NECESSARY TO ENSURE KINDER MORGAN CANADA PIPELINE CONSTRUCTION STARTS ON SCHEDULE LATER THIS YEAR
* ALBERTA PREMIER NOTLEY, ASKED IF SHE KNOWS OF OTHER POTENTIAL INVESTORS IN TRANS MOUNTAIN EXPANSION, SAYS ‘THAT’S WELL BEYOND WHERE WE WANT TO GO RIGHT NOW’
* ALBERTA PREMIER NOTLEY, ASKED IF PROVINCIAL AND FEDERAL GOVTS ARE DEADLOCKED IN TALKS WITH KINDER MORGAN CANADA, SAYS ‘I WOULDN’T GO THERE AT ALL, THERE IS STILL WORK TO DO’
* ALBERTA PREMIER NOTLEY SAYS ‘I AM PRETTY CONFIDENT WE WILL GET TO THE RIGHT PLACE EVENTUALLY’ ON KINDER MORGAN CANADA PIPELINE Further company coverage: (Reporting by David Ljunggren)
